sentences.sContent: But that also reduces the amplitude of the motion, making it harder to detect.
sentences.sContent_eng: But that also reduces the amplitude of the motion, making it harder to detect.
sentences.sCn: 但这种做法同时也降低了运动的振幅，使运动更难被探测到。

sentences.sContent: So even if no energy is lost, you are still going to get less amplitude as it is spreading out.
sentences.sContent_eng: So even if no energy is lost, you are still going to get less amplitude as it is spreading out.
sentences.sCn: 因此，如果这中间没有能量损失的话，即便海啸传播到很远，它依然会保留较小的振幅。

sentences.sContent: Built-in stabilizers: relationships which reduce the amplitude of cyclical fluctuation in the economy without any direct action by government firms or individuals.
sentences.sContent_eng: Built-in stabilizers: relationships which reduce the amplitude of cyclical fluctuation in the economy without any direct action by government firms or individuals.
sentences.sCn: 内在稳定器：指减少经济中周期性波动的振幅而无需政府，企业或个人采取直接行动的内在关系。

phrases.pCn: 振幅比，幅值比；幅度比率

trans.tranOther: the distance between the middle and the top or bottom of a  wave  such as a  sound wave
